name: Naga
shortLoreBlurb: Naga is a spirit from India/SE Asia associated with serpents, water, guardians. Stories warn that respect for waters and their spirits is essential. Serpentine power signals both wisdom and danger at liminal borders.
overlapsLinks: Athena (Greek), Durga (Hindu), Fafnir (Norse), Jörmungandr (Norse), Karttikeya (Hindu), Manannán mac Lir (Celtic), Naga (India/SE Asia), Poseidon (Greek), Quetzalcoatl (Aztec), Sekhmet (Egyptian), Tangaroa (Polynesian), Yemaya (Yoruba)
description: Naga is a spirit from India/SE Asia associated with serpents, water, guardians. Stories warn that respect for waters and their spirits is essential. Serpentine power signals both wisdom and danger at liminal borders.
